title: Miscellaneous
content:
XML - eXtensible Markup Language
JSON - JavaScript Object Notation
HTML: HyperText Markup Language, defines content of web pages and the HTML5 is a new version.

3 v's of Big Data: volume, velocity, and variety

A code can be seen by the Client. A Server cannot see the code and the data is only for display on the browser.

<script type="text/javascript">
      var input = window.prompt("Enter your name");
           document.write(input)
</script>
